name: Domestic R&D performance by source of funds and performer, by industry and company size: 2016
description: Domestic R&D performance by source of funds and performer, by industry and company size: 2016

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.description: Paid For By The Company Total

variableMeasured.description: Paid For By The Company R D Performed By Others Purchased And Collaborative R D

variableMeasured.description: Paid For By The Company R D Performed By The Company

variableMeasured.description: Paid For By Others R D Performed By Others Subcontracted Or Passed Through R D Costs

variableMeasured.name: field_paid_for_by_others_r_d_performed_by_the_company_paid_for_by_non_u_s_government_sources

specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: Detail may not add to total because of rounding. Industry classification is based on the dominant business code for domestic R&D performance, where available. For companies that did not report business codes, the classification used for sampling was assigned. Statistics are representative of companies located in the United States that performed or funded R&D.
sources: National Science Foundation, National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, and U.S. Census Bureau, Business R&D and Innovation Survey, 2016.
